title.native: 英雄王、武を極めるため転生す ～そして、世界最強の見習い騎士♀～
title.romaji: Eiyuu-ou, Bu wo Kiwameru Tame Tenseisu: Soshite, Sekai Saikyou no Minarai Kishi♀
title.english: Reborn to Master the Blade: From Hero-King to Extraordinary Squire

description:
After living a life devoted to serving his country and people, Inglis’ one wish to be free of a king’s burden and to train was actually heard, but as a beautiful girl! Reborn in the far future as a daughter to renowned knights, Inglis can now focus on mastering the martial arts. A wish has been granted, and Inglis will be on the front lines fulfilling the dream of becoming the strongest knight.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: ราชาวีรชน เกิดใหม่เพื่อขัดเกลาวิถีต่อสู้ และ กลายเป็นอัศวินฝึกหัดที่แกร่งสุดในโลก
英雄王，為了窮盡武道而轉生～而後成為世界最強見習騎士♀～
英雄王，为了穷尽武道而转生～然后，成为世界最强的见习骑士♀
Eiyuuou, Bu wo Kiwameru Tame Tenseisu
Raja Pahlawan Bereinkarnasi Untuk Mengasah Ilmu Bela Diri
Переродился, чтобы стать мастером меча: из великого короля в ученицу рыцаря

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Archery
tags.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.
